modName: Straightforward Blades - All In One Plus Greatswords
summary: Combination of all of my Straightforward Blades with the addition of straightened greatswords. As requested.
descriptionHtml:
This is a combination of several remeshes I put togeather to straighten out and toughen up the ascetics of some of the vanilla swords.

It straightens out and beefs up the Ebony Sword, Greatsword, and Dagger, as well as the Orcish Sword and Greatsword, and remodels the Iron Sword to look a bit more formidable.

The Iron Sword is bases unapologetically on the Ordon Sword from The Legend of Zelda: Twilight Princess. I love that sword...
author: Kyim
